jasminezhoulab/Hi-Corrector.name: jasminezhoulab/Hi-Corrector
jasminezhoulab/Hi-Corrector.description: Hi-Corrector is a fast, scalable and memory-efficient software package to remove biases from chromatin contact matrices generated by genome-wide proximity ligation assays, e.g. Hi-C and its variant TCC. The sequential version is implemented in ANSI C and can be easily compiled on any system; the parallel version is implemented in ANSI C with the MPI library (a standardized and portable parallel environment designed for solving large-scale scientific problems).

bxlab/hifive.name: bxlab/hifive
bxlab/hifive.description: Tools for handling HiC and 5C data

dereneaton/ipyrad.description: Interactive assembly and analysis of RAD-seq data sets

treangenlab/komb.name: treangenlab/komb
treangenlab/komb.description: KOMB is a tool for fast identification of unitigs of interest in metagenomes. KOMB introduces the concept of a Hybrid Unitig Graph (an extension to compacted de Bruijn graphs) and relies on k-core and K-truss decomposition algorithms.

ViriatoII/MindaGap.description: Fill empty grids of a panorama made from several tiles with sensefull values (mean of imediate neighbourhood)

NBISweden/MrBayes.name: NBISweden/MrBayes
NBISweden/MrBayes.description: MrBayes is a program for Bayesian inference and model choice across a wide range of phylogenetic and evolutionary models. For documentation and downloading the program, please see the home page:

TheBrownLab/PhyloFisher.name: TheBrownLab/PhyloFisher
TheBrownLab/PhyloFisher.description: PhyloFisher is a software package written in Python3 that can be used for the creation, analysis, and visualization of phylogenomic datasets that consist of eukaryotic protein sequences.

saccharis/SACCHARIS_2.description: CLI and GUI based bioinformatics pipeline to automate phylogenetic analysis of CAZyme families in FASTA sequences.
